pages.text: $(o)"The second human to rise, the second human to guard. The first human in blue, the first carrier of a sword. The Knight swings his blade and pleads to the Sun, the Knight will guard, the Knight will attack.$(br)He is holy, he is also human. He has shown compassion, even more than the Angel, and he will help us defend ourselves."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with a $(item)Diamond Sword$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)When active, this statue will provide strength to every player nearby, and will increase Magan regeneration slightly.
